enable_ipv4.description: Attach an IPv4 on the public NIC. If false, no IPv4 address will be attached.

enable_ipv6.description: Attach an IPv6 on the public NIC. If false, no IPv6 address will be attached.

ipv4.description: ID of the ipv4 Primary IP to use. If omitted and enable_ipv4 is true, a new ipv4 Primary IP will automatically be created.

ipv6.description: ID of the ipv6 Primary IP to use. If omitted and enable_ipv6 is true, a new ipv6 Primary IP will automatically be created.
